name: Create Barcodes for TSheets users
description:
This templates help you generate automatically ID badges with unique barcodes / QR codes for your staff. 
The template uses this [example model](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1znku94U-HmvQIwU-9Tj3XEEyUVRI-atVHHDn3EfwMK8/edit?usp=sharing) from Google Docs.
